sentences.en: a knight wearing a suit of armour
He has taken to travelling in an armour-plated car.
His body was encased in shining armour.
sentences.cn: 他全身披着明晃晃的甲胄.

sentences.en: His body was protected by armour fore and aft.
sentences.cn: 他的身体前前后后都有盔甲保护.

sentences.en: It is an armour and a weapon.
The armour is displayed in a long gallery.
The arrow glanced off his armour.
The squadron's armour is draped in sand-coloured nets that melt into the landscape.
sentences.cn: 装甲连的装甲车上罩着沙色的网，和周围的风景融为一体。

sentences.en: There had been no crack in Tynan's armour armor.
sentences.cn: 从泰纳恩身上找不出什么破绽.

sentences.en: They spotted armour moving up the valley.
sentences.cn: 他们发现装甲车队正沿着山谷行进.

sentences.en: We have less infantry and armour than the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们的步兵和装甲兵均比敌军的少.

sentences.en: We were hopelessly outnumbered, beset by masses of armour, and almost surrounded.
sentences.cn: 兵力过于悬殊, 受到大批装甲部队的围攻,我们几乎被包围了.

words.tran_cn: 装甲的；铠装的；蛇皮管的

trans.tran_en: metal or leather clothing that protects your body, worn by soldiers in battles in past times
